sentences.en: If Orson can do those things, who knows where all this is going?
sentences.cn: 如果奥森有这种能力谁知道这种事情又会在哪儿发生 呢 ?

sentences.en: In the later stages of his directorial career, Orson Welles began work on several ambitious films.
sentences.cn: 在其导演生涯的后半阶段，奥森·韦尔斯开始执导起了几部恢宏巨制。

sentences.en: Orson : Why, it's a loose tile.
sentences.cn: 为什么, 只是一块松动的瓷砖.

sentences.en: Orson Welles was a mere 26 when he wrote, produced, directed, and starred in Citizen Kane.
sentences.cn: 奥逊·威尔斯在导演 、 编剧和主演电影《公民凯恩》时年仅26岁.

sentences.en: Orson: Your mother was right to end that relationship.
sentences.cn: 我很高兴你们觉得我的生活毁了是这么好笑的事情.
名扬四海的奥森∙韦尔斯

sentences.en: The punishment decided that bright Qoigyi Orson reserve forces'deadline.
sentences.cn: 处罚决定中并未明确吉奥森下放预备队的期限.

sentences.en: Valentine and Orson, the parted twins, meet, fight, recognise each other, and are reunited.
sentences.cn: 瓦伦丁和奥森, 这对被分离的双胞胎后来相遇 、 战斗, 最终认出对方并重新团聚.
